A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don’t understand the negative reviews. I was kept to the edge of my seat the whole film as I was dazzled with new and old characters\, planets and villains. Like Empire\, this film has the feel of a backlash against the idealism of A New Hope. A rebalancing of the force is at hand as the journey parallels the original trilogy without being a scene for scene rehash which was my only criticism of The Force Awakens. Long story short: as a lifetime Star Wars fan I always temper my expectations since the Jar-Jar Binks fiasco but this movie held up and sets the scene for an awesome conclusion to the trilogy.
